website_summaries.verdict: Puts out a good amount of heat for a small, lower-priced heater.
pros: Features an adjustable thermostat and your choice of fan, low, or high settings
Many buyers describe the sound it makes as similar to white noise
cons: Some durability and quality issues have been reported, with units arriving broken or breaking within a few weeks
While the fan isn't too loud, it may still be an annoyance for some

customer_reviews.title: NOT UL LISTED
customer_reviews.text: The product description for this heater is incorrect. The item claims to be UL listed but it is not. I returned it as soon as I received it and noticed it did not include the UL safety listing included in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Henderson

customer_reviews.title: What a little work horse!
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this little heater up as soon as I received it. I'm surprised at the amount of force the fan puts out and the heat it generates. So far it is working great. The thermostat works fine also. I have kept mine on high bc I have a large room. I bought this to supplement the main heat and keep my large living room a little warmer...but this is generating enough heat that it keeps the main heat pump from coming on at all! We are having 30 degree temps....so it's doing a great job! I'm impressed amd pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: High quality compact heater!
customer_reviews.text: I instantly liked this heater. It has excellent air flow. The fan forces the air through the ceramic heating element at a high rate. It heats beautifully. The thermostat seems to function but I wish they put a temperature range to get an idea of what you're setting it at. That is my only complaint and it's a small one compared to how awesome this heater functions. If you're looking for a compact, powerful, inexpensive and quality built heater I would get one of these. I will be getting more of these heaters.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Is heater is perfect. Took my bathroom from 60 degrees to 75 ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small heater for my bathroom. Is heater is perfect. Took my bathroom from 60 degrees to 75 in a short amount of time. If you adjust the temperature dial it turns off and on when it warms up or cools down.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bigler

customer_reviews.title: poor quality control most likely
customer_reviews.text: The heater functioned poorly from the beginning. With the thermostat all the way up it would heat for a minute, then turn off for 5 minutes (approximately), not providing much heat. A week ago this changed so that no matter what setting the thermostat was on, the heater would stay on all the time. Finally, this morning when I tried to use it there was no response at all. It's completely broken.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you plan on using it for longer than a week
customer_reviews.text: It was great for about one week and then completely stopped working, I'll have to return it and get a new one unfortunately. However, (update) the seller was extremely nice and offered a refund for the product so it could have been just a faulty one. Give it a shot at least because it was nice while it worked, just don't leave it plugged in for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last 5 months, which is surprising since I only used the low heat setting or the fan without heat. Clearly, this is an example of you get what you pay for. The search is on again for a reliable space heater.
customer_reviews.author: Susie C.

customer_reviews.title: Quite Loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty powerful little heater, warms my whole apartment quickly. Like other reviewers I do find it to be too loud. Distractingly loud. But it works well so I don’t hate it.
customer_reviews.author: AlexME

customer_reviews.title: There is a light, so we know it's on ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a light, so we know it's on. Right now, it's about 60 degrees in our living room and we can't get this heater to blow out heat....at all. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: jason pilkenton

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater it's a Comfort Zone🔥... not a Bovado
customer_reviews.text: So I got to tell you I was unsure about buying this, we bought one last year and it caught fire at the outfit and it's not a Bovado but it's actually a Comfort Zone brand. It's been running nonstop for a full month now and it heats our bedroom, the bathroom and the hallway in between without a problem. The thermostat works great, safety tip works great, it's a great little heater, very quiet too. Either way it I'd well worth the money for sure! I definitely recommend, we ordered two more and they come quick too 👍🏻👍🏻 very pleased with out purchase this time around
customer_reviews.author: Nichol Marie Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need it to and then some! It is a little loud so when I am with patients or on the phone I have to turn it off (it sits underneath my desk). It also warms up the whole area and gets a little too hot too quick, in my opinion. I find myself having to frequently turn it off and on again because it gets too hot, and that's on the low setting.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 years ago and still working great.
customer_reviews.text: Heats up my bedroom during the winter. It does take awhile (30 min +) though to get to a comfortable temp, and this is winter time in Southern California, not exactly known for cold weather. For actual colder areas, i'm not sure how this will fare. Ill probably guess it'll take a couple hours to get to a comfortable temperature. I wouldn't use this in a room bigger than a bedroom, but i don't think that is its intended use anyways. Bottom line, for where I live, it is sufficient and does quite nicely; for colder areas, you'll have to read other people's reviews.
customer_reviews.author: james yi

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with the amount of heat this little heater can put out. I have only had it for a few days so I cannot speak to its durability, but the first time I turned it on, I felt my room begin to warm up immediately. Using it on low fan at the halfway temperature setting, it keeps my 144 sq foot living room comfortably warm (at least 70 degrees). I never even need to turn the temperature up to maximum, because it would be too warm. It does make a fan noise which might bother some, but I think this little heater is great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: christi moffatt

customer_reviews.title: Great Until It Wasn't - Smoked After Use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on 9/7/18 and immediately put it to use in a very cold office. Two days ago, 7/23/19, I smelled something burning from behind me and noticed smoke coming from the unit. I shut it off and unplugged it. After letting it rest a while I turned it on to check it only to find that the incident switched the buttons controls on the unit. Off = low heat, low = off, high heat is the same, and the fan no longer works. It was great until that moment. Not sure what happened aside from burnout. My usage was very heavy: 5x/week from 9am-4pm nearly nonstop and only occasional fan usage.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Warms my office
customer_reviews.text: Living in NYS the winters are very cold. I have a roughly 10' x 10' office and this heater is just the right size. Very small and compact physically but large enough that it isn't running all day. At times you'll have to keep messing with the temperature to keep in comfortable but over all it's a great little heater. I would probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt_716

customer_reviews.title: Heats small spaces well, but didn't last - won't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because I wanted extra warmth around my desk at work. This space heater, IMO, is designed for small spaces such as the one I was using it for. It did its job while it lasted. I used the heater daily from 7a-3p for about 6 months. It no longer works. The heater is inexpensive so I wasn't expecting years and years of use, but I would expect it to last longer than 6 months. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SM2012

customer_reviews.title: Good General Heater
customer_reviews.text: I find that this heater is good for a small room, but it'll only be hot in the small area that the heat comes from. This means when I'm trying to warm up my feet, I like to put them in front of the heater, and it'll get hot fast and slightly burn my feet but only on certain spots. I have to rotate my feet because it gets hot fast and my feet are still cold overall after using the heater. It has a control at the bottom so that it makes sure it is upright to be used, which is good to avoid fires or accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Powerful Heater!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a powerful little heater!! I was always freezing to death in the office, due to poor circulation from sitting all day. Even though I've just got a cubicle, so not a completely enclosed area, this heats it right up! I no longer have to bundle for the arctic just to go to work!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love that it turns off when you move or pick up.
customer_reviews.text: We've used this space heater daily for our bathroom. I love that it stops working if you pick it up/ move it. It definitely warms up our average sized bathroom. We've had it for 2 months so far, hopefully it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: gjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Money is tight and my boyfriend couldn’t afford a heater. I bought this for my boyfriend, since he lives where it snows or just gets super cold during the winter. He used to have to where layers of clothes along with three blankets to get warm. From what he has told me, it works great! When he puts it on max heat, it is able to warm up his entire room. It doesn’t make too much noise to the point where it is annoying. I’m so glad I was able to bring him comfort during the winter thanks to this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little heater. Heats my bedroom and hallway. Has high and low heat settings, but best of all when the room is the perfect temperature you can turn the thermostat down till it clicks and the heater will maintain that temperature. Great product and priced right!
customer_reviews.author: ROXANNE MONTGOMERY

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heater. So we had this before in old apartment, heater was provided by landlord and it was very helpful in bathroom because there was always cold. Unfortunately I had to leave this heater when I was moving to new place but I am so happy I found it on amazon because I've been using this for 3 years and it was working perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra W.

customer_reviews.title: It's a heater.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, this is a direct replacement for one that I had already purchased... Runs quiet, has 4 settings (Off, Fan, Low heat, High Heat) the tip over protection is a button on the bottom that if contact with the surface on the bottom of the heater is "disconnected" the heater stops, when contact is restored the heater will continue as it was before. Over all a nice little heater that does the job and at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: D Stake

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy right here transforms my 12x12 bedroom from a cold box to a cozy warm space in a matter of minutes! No more getting out of the shower freezing, no more getting out of the bed with the fear of being cold, and no more hiding under my covers all night. Love the safety tipping feature, which is a must, and it's small and lightweight - I can move it anywhere really easily. Very simple and easy to use - no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Huang

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Loud and already breaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a space heater to use under my desk. I could hear the noise but it wasn't overwhelming. Over a few weeks, it slowly got louder and louder until people started asking what the sound was. Then it started going in and out, and it seems the fan is making loud clicking noises. A maintenance guy who walked in immediately laughed at the noise and said the heater is already going out. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Got this a few weeks back and decided to run it out in garage for a few hours in case any new smells needed to be burned off. There were none that I noticed. Everything functioned as advertised. I was surprised at the amount of heat it put out as compared to a previous brand we have. I have a true test coming up with a RV trip to Yellowstone. I will try to update my rating after the trip.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Cheap shoddy and potentially dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Got mine in my rv main room. I found product match results for this heater on the web and it was high on the list. I thought this would heat my little 10x10 space easily. Wrong, heater doesnt work well at all. The fan speed is wired wrong lol.I thought that was quaint at first and I am wondering if anyone els has one like that. Heater scares me because of the obvious flaws, it could be a fire hazard. Not worth the buy, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Buyit4theGirls

customer_reviews.title: Only one complaint...
customer_reviews.text: Nice little heater. My only complaint: the handle for lifting/carrying the unit is awkward, poorly designed. Hard to grasp the unit when I'm wrapping the cord around it for storage. Other than that, it performs as expected. I use it in a 200 sf bathroom with tile floor. It warms the area in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Cassiopea

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised & extremely happy with this heater
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised & extremely happy with this heater! I paint & do craftwork in our garage and this is where I use it. When I woke at 5:30am, it was below freezing. Less than an half hour after turning it on, our garage was comfortable enough to stay in!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Potenzone

customer_reviews.title: Very loud, not very warm
customer_reviews.text: The heater sounds like a freight train, the high and low settings are the same and the warm air barely seeps out. I wouldn't recommend this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lee

customer_reviews.title: The reviews really let me down
customer_reviews.text: The Little Heater is loud and vibrates/twists after positioning it toward the desired direction of heat. Also, there's no difference between the fan settings.
customer_reviews.author: Marco B

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This thing pumps out some serious heat. It's definitely a bit loud but it does the job quite well. It does make the air in my room quite dry... but that's a small price to pay for good warmth during cold months. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amin Ardehali

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect much from it.
customer_reviews.text: At 75% on the dial, it barely keeps my 23ft. rv at 45 degrees when it's 32 outside. Thankfully I only use it to keep it from freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Lotliku

customer_reviews.title: Nice little heater for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, quality heater. I bought it primarily to use in the bathroom during the colder months, though my mom commandeered it to warm her legs and feet while she watches television. I like the automatic shut off feature. *I edited this to four stars because it started making a rattling sound after about a week of use. It still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: c.holtz

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Sound and Heat
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of these heaters to heat a small room. It worked well for that purpose, but I've since transformed it into a sleeping white noise machine with just the fan running and no heat. It blocks all the outside noises including train horns. I have since bought two more, one for back-up and another to use as a heater. These are excellent little devices and hold up well at very little cost. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and good for under desk
customer_reviews.text: Small and good for under desk. Can't imagine it heating up more than a 10x10 room. Built in tip over function is a bit too sensitive as I can barely adjust the settings without it kicking off. But better safe than sorry I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Boxman

customer_reviews.title: Great for an RV
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit for our 24 foot travel trailer so we could use it to heat the interior of the coach instead of using the propane furnace. We took out this past weekend when outside temperatures dipped into the mid 30's. I must say it performed like a champ. We used the low setting only and it was toasty warm inside. I will say my only complaint is it's a little noisy, but it never seemed to put a strain on the power in our travel trailer. The item was delivered quickly and packed well. For the price I don't know how you can beat it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This little heater worked great. It put off good heat and was not loud. However, the thermostat stopped working after about 12 months and then the fan stopped working after 14 months - just after the 1 year warranty of course. I'll buy a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill O.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I only used this product a few months before it started to not work properly. First, it stopped rotating and would be stuck in an odd position. Finally, it stopped staying on more than a couple minutes. I decided that was too dangerous for me so I stopped using it in my home office as I work. The buttons on top are touch buttons and they don't work very well either after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: HonestBuddha

customer_reviews.title: Electrical malfunction after 2 years of limited use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater just shy of 2 years ago. Because I live in a warm climate, the heater is used intermittently some Winter days, at most 4 months out of the year. Yesterday, an audible change (click) was heard inside the heater while the unit was running. The smell of what appeared to be burning wires within the machine immediately alerted me , at which point I unplugged the unit. Thank goodness I was sitting 6 feet away when the malfunction occurred. The results could have been much worse.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Beth

customer_reviews.title: Powerful small heater but handle is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful small heater but handle is useless. It puts out a lot of heat, very compact and has safety tip over cut off feature. BUT you will need to pick it up with both hands to move it. The small cut out in the back that acts as a grip/handle isn’t deep enough to put your fingers in so you immediately drop it. I’m a 5’2 female with small hands so it would be even harder for larger hands. I will keep it simply because it’s just for my cold tile bathroom on cold mornings but I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Eason

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these little guys and they are lifesavers. I tend to be colder than others so I have one in my office and one at home downstairs. You can't imagine the heat these things put out. And, they don't have those stupid timers that turn them off after a certain amount of time. I will keep mine on for 8 hours at a time. Great buy and super cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Condray

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just got a bad one? Ended up returning and going with something ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful for its small size. Feels a bit flimsy. Heated up my bedroom in no time, but died after a week. Maybe I just got a bad one? Ended up returning and going with something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Ravensarrow

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Heater
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater because it also has a fan feature. I love it and use both options frequently. It heats really well, especially if I have my office door closed. I use this in a small personal office and I usually only have it on for an hour or less as it gets my office very warm. As far as the fan goes it takes a little bit longer to feel cooled off but I love it. I would definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a very impressive little heater! For how small it is, I was surprised to feel the beam of heat from about 6 to 7 feet away, even on the low setting.. the heat is propelled via a little fan and motor inside, as many other small heaters of similar fashion. I believe this one also contains ceramic plates. This small heater can easily warm up a bedroom on the low setting in about 20 mins. A large living area on the high setting probably around 45 mins.. Lightweight, easy to use, and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: kevin h

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire after one year.
customer_reviews.text: Literally caught on fire after making some weird noises about a year in. I was immensely lucky that I was nearby to turn it off immediately. Still filled my room with smoke even after a few seconds of fire. From the other reviews I read it's not UL listed? This thing can literally burn your house down if you plan on using it after 11 months. Even if it's covered under warranty I wouldn't want another unless serious safety improvements have been made.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I had this heater for about 10 years prior and it finally went on me! I bought it again and absolutely love it. Its lightweight and small, but it really heats up my room. Plus I would take it to the library when I use to study. I hate the cold so it was great for me
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Graham

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's gaming room. He was getting chills while on long gaming sessions. He has user it about every day and now he has to turn it off because it heats the entire room not just a small zone around him. Well worth the price great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of heat from a little heater
customer_reviews.text: I needed this heater to warm up our bathroom. I have very little space in there so it needed to be small and safe. This heater is. It's got a lot of power and ended up not only keeping our bathroom warm but the bedroom near it is also warmer and that's with it only in the first section of the thermostat setting! We definitely recommend this to our friends and you.
customer_reviews.author: Deedot

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off randomly.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my office. Came with a weird residue on the top, no big deal. What I cannot handle is the random shutting off. If I’m at work and too busy to notice, I could leave for the day thinking it’s not on. Now, I have to unplug it every day just to be sure. I would have returned it if I kept the box. I can’t wait for winter to end.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Good heater, too loud for an office
customer_reviews.text: Was a little too loud for me to continue using in the office. I bought a $10 one from Walmart instead (still not quiet enough for my liking - why is it so hard to find a quiet space heater?! 😂) This one stays in my bedroom now and it works great! My room gets nice and warm FAST. The only thing is that the heat doesn’t last too long once you turn it off, but all in all I love it, it works great (just not for a quiet office space).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty warm for it being so small
customer_reviews.text: Pretty warm for it being so small. It's a little bit noisy. I'd give it four stars but it stopped working after three months of me using it. The day it stopped working, it clicked off after only running for 15 minutes, then started to let off a burning smell. If you're looking for something temporary, this is fine for the cost, but if you're looking for something to last, I'd probably invest in something better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tiny, does not heat a room for sure. It smells of burning. Turns off soon after you turn it on because it overheats fast. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia

customer_reviews.title: How loud the heater is.
customer_reviews.text: The heater puts out a good amount of heat and in 2 days has worked well. I have two observations that would prevent my buying additional units. (1) The heater is loud. Window airconditioner loud. No kidding, that loud. (2) There is no filter on the air intake side and I suspect dust gets blown across the heating element and may cause a problem in the future.
customer_reviews.author: woodworkr

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine while it worked
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine while it worked. I bought this January 14th, and it stopped working March 26th. Now it's beyond the return window. $30 for two months of heat, I guess?
customer_reviews.author: S. Slevinski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little heater
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little heater! I bought this to put under my desk at work. It’s small but powerful and has a safety function where if it’s tipped over it shuts off. Great purchase for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a small but powerful little heater capable of getting my room nice and warm in no time. My only complaints are that the dials on top are a little wonky, making them difficult to turn. It is also much louder than I was expecting. I have used the exact same type and brand of heater and it made almost no noise, whereas this one rumbles quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This heater always had a very loud sound while running, especially on the low setting. Because of this I had to run it on high because I work in an office and could not hear my coworkers. And now it's giving off a burning smell and is unusable. TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Cranks out the heat for a small heater
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The perfect size for my office. Cranks out the heat, and warms the area quickly. Some of the other reviews mention the sensitivity of the safety feature. It does click off immediately when not securely on the floor, but it restarts the second you set it back down. Not a problem. The sound is somewhat like a hair dryer on low, which might be bothersome if you're hoping for something whisper quiet. But for me, it's fine. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! when it showed up at my door I was bummed it was so small, but then I plugged it in and had no problem heating up my room or even my house. This thing is amazingly powerful and energy efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: This little heater puts out very good heat. I bought it as a replacement for a similar model, but this unit is much better. I keep it under my desk to keep my feet warm in the winter, and it certainly does the job. Just plug it in, and turn it on - and you're sure to be pleased!
customer_reviews.author: E.A. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a medium sized bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a medium sized bedroom. I also put it in the TV room to heat us when we watch TV; the TV room is open and extends to the kitchen and entrance, so it works well while we are sitting on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small areas. Perfect heater.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little spot heater. For a bathroom in the winter when you shower to take the chill off the room. Easy to put away when not using it. It will also be used at an office desk area to keep warm instead of heating the whole office.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte simmons

customer_reviews.title: Too loud. Ok otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The fan is way to loud for it's size. It's not going to drown out conversation or anything, but i've had a lot of heaters of different sizes that were all noticeably quieter than this. Also it's much smaller than I expected. But i didn't take off points for that because, to be fair, I didn't read the dimensions in detail. It's a small under-desk heater, not small/medium room size heater.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jumper

customer_reviews.title: Serious Heat!
customer_reviews.text: This thing kicks out some SERIOUS heat for being so tiny! Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Obviousman

customer_reviews.title: This is good space heater for the price
customer_reviews.text: If some people got bad unite I think those are just some rare case. I have been using this for a month. Heats up a good size room within 15 mins or so. I never have it on more than 15 mins. I usually use in the morning or before the heat the kicks in. I have it plugged with a smart plug and google/alexa. Works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: it turns off before i want it to. my ...
customer_reviews.text: it turns off before i want it to. my old one kept running when it was on high. this one won't. it puts out plenty of heat when it's on, just don't stay on long enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it’s literally the most perfect heater
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought it a few years ago but when I came to college I left it at my parents house. it’s quiet enough to let me sleep, and the light hum is very relaxing. warms up pretty fast and keep my room warm at night. my apartment doesn’t have centralized heating and this is enough to keep my room warm all night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Camila Leal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My best friend! I have one of it next to my bed specially during the winter and one in my office under my desk!
customer_reviews.author: Negin

customer_reviews.title: Good white noise, powerful heat
customer_reviews.text: Did the job! Warmed out bedroom when set only half way. No doubt could've warmed a much larger space. Relatively quiet, good white noise. The auto turn off was never a problem and I feel good knowing it'll stop if it tips over.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Pawdgers

customer_reviews.title: Size and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida but there are still times when a small heater in a garage or in a bathroom helps to take the chill off. As with any electrical appliance, be aware of the closeness of water to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Voiles

customer_reviews.title: NICE, Shhhhhh very Quiet and great for personal area warmth
customer_reviews.text: tidy neat and quiet to operate. Purchased for my always freezing wife who needed something that would be suitable for her office and small enough to not draw anyone's attention (not supposed to bring in heaters) so tucked under the desk it sits unseen and notably unheard.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bran

customer_reviews.title: It does a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this space heater to heat a bedroom, and it does a fantastic job keeping the room warm. Very easy to use and it's pretty quiet. I like the automatic shut off feature should the unit tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Terri R. Stonecipher

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. I really like the safety tip over ...
customer_reviews.text: Warms up a space fast. Nice size. I really like the safety tip over kill switch. I need another one and will but this again from the same vendor. Arrived when promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a small space, easy to move and I love the fact that if it’s picked up or knocked over it will shut off (small pressure button on bottom) we use it to warm our small living room (12x12) and it makes it comfortable for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: My second phone. Throws great heat and it's not impacting the electric bill very much at all. It makes a blowing sound so don't expect quiet. But it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should....heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these heater to use at work. It does exactly what I need it to do, keep me warm. Only concern is there was a few hours the heater stopped working. Turned on, but heat. Started working again just as suddenly and haven't had a problem since then.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: It is Little but it is MIGHTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a Great little Heater!! This thing is SO Much Bang for the Buck!! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Candace L.

customer_reviews.title: heater
customer_reviews.text: This item is used at work in a small parking booth. It keeps them warm and it is safe to leave on when they are out of the booth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heater
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater it keeps me very warm and happy! Just be careful not to overheat it or it will shutoff and possibly damage it.
customer_reviews.author: Opiate_Taylor

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and portable
customer_reviews.text: very good heater I dont even need heat after this is on. It heats up a small room very well
customer_reviews.author: nil

customer_reviews.title: Fan won't come on
customer_reviews.text: We had this same heater that we used for a long time and it worked great. One day it would heat up but the fan just wouldn't come on. It gave off a hot, burning smell. I ordered the same exact one but the first day I plugged it in and turned it on, it did the same thing. I even double-checked to make sure I had the new one! I am returning and going with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces, loud, OK overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little guy to keep my bathroom warm and I'll be honest, it does the job... But i wish it would 1) heat up the space faster and 2) have a hotter highest temperature. It takes about 10 minutes to feel warm in the room... The highest setting will not make the room unbearably hot. I even keep it in my room on the highest setting when I'm sleeping and it does the job as well but l would imagine that if you have a room bigger than my 10x10 bedroom or plan on using this for somewhere other than a small office you should get a more powerful one. it is also pretty loud...
customer_reviews.author: Master Zeta

customer_reviews.title: It is small, it works, it was inexpensive and heats well.
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews because the first heater I bought (not this brand) worked only twice. Bovado USA had the best reviews and comparisons of any small heater that I shopped on Amazon. It is very small but really puts out the heat for a small space. Good safety features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bovado 166648 Space Heater
customer_reviews.text: Noisy.... I am trying to read here...! Heat is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: 2-b determined

customer_reviews.title: Affordable for the Cold Season
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing that it’s really hot, sometimes I wish there was a timer for it can automatically switch off cause sometimes I knock out and it’s still on then I’m in bed like damn I really left that on all night. Overall great for its price, doesn’t make my studio warm if I’m being honest. Only to what it’s pointing at
customer_reviews.author: Steven Batz

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit noisy - doesn't matter - gives off a nice amount of heat for such a small item. As long as I'm warm i can bear the noise.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Works incredibly well and I loved that it auto shuts off it if gets tipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Works incredibly well and I loved that it auto shuts off it if gets tipped over. Heats up our bathroom within just a couple minutes
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine & Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Comfort-Zone Space Heater  Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater for my office. It is the perfect size, fairly quiet, and has the fan/heater features that I wanted. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K.

customer_reviews.title: poor heat distribution, not good for big rooms
customer_reviews.text: i can only feel the heat when it’s a few feet away from me. otherwise you can’t really feel the heat because it didn’t spread throughout our room so it didn’t really change the overall temp of my room. also really loud so i can’t sleep with it on at night. this may work for smaller rooms but we have a big master bedroom so didn’t reallt work out for us
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is small and compact, but within 20 minutes my apartment is 10 degreees warmer. I can feel the heat from 5 feet away. It has a temperature setting, low, high, fan, and off. Once you pick it up and move it, it turns off for safety. Great purchase, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Randolph

customer_reviews.title: A little giant
customer_reviews.text: We’re astonished by how much heat comes out of this tiny heater. It entirely eliminates the draft-induced cold feet that have been a feature of our recent freeze. It’s quiet, efficient, and easy to store away once the weather breaks. Heartily recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TMickey

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch for it's size
customer_reviews.text: This heater is very small and puts out a ton of heat for it's size. We use it for our 31 ft. travel trailer and it works great. I love the automatic shut-off feature and the variable thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: TB7

customer_reviews.title: The best mini heater you can find
customer_reviews.text: I use thus in a small room and keep it on low on the lowest setting and my room will be as cozy as a fire place in winter.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Hot Hot Hot
customer_reviews.text: Great for a smaller room or space near your laptop on those cold nights. This thing kicks out some nice heat and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for small area
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater! I bought to have a small heater under my desk at work during the winter months. Works great and has nice heat output.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: puts out a lot of heat in my office it ...
customer_reviews.text: puts out a lot of heat in my office it is the only heat source in the room. the thermostat works very well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works.
customer_reviews.text: I use this great little heater to heat a small bedroom and am totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LAP

customer_reviews.title: Does the little Job
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes for me. Does the little jobs of keeping warm. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nohorses

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Just right for a really small space on my bathroom counter. I turn it on and then go make coffee etc. My bathroom is toasty when I get back! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Rumpelstiltskin

product_meta.title: BOVADO USA Portable 166648 Ceramic Space Heater, Personal Warming Fan with Adjustable Thermostat, Carrying Handle & Safety Features-by Comfort Zone (Black), 10 x 6 x 6
product_meta.description:
Size:10 x 6 x 6A MULTIPURPOSE, PORTABLE APPLIANCE
This Fan-forced Ceramic Heater by Comfort Zone is made to take the chill out and warm you up almost anywhere you want. Unlike other space heaters than can be unwieldy, ours is compact and lightweight, with a convenient carrying handle for easy transportation. The fan-forced heat dispersion ensures that it evenly distributes heat, even in small spaces. This small-sized heater can fit even underneath tables or on desktops to beat the bitter chill while you eat a meal or do paperwork. Use it in your bedroom to fight frigid winter temperatures and get a good night’s sleep.

CUSTOMIZE TO YOUR COMFORT
Adjust the heat to your comfort level! This Fan-forced Ceramic Heater by Comfort Zone features three different settings with an adjustable thermostat. Turn the switch on the right with the white print to either High heat, Low heat, or Fan only, and then turn the switch on the left with the red print to adjust the thermostat.

ABOUT COMFORT ZONE
Comfort Zone has become a trusted brand, recognized nationally as a leader in home environment products. Comfort Zone heaters provide safe and reliable performance and are designed and tested to meet strict global quality standards including UL, ETL, SAA, CE, CSA and NOM. Crafted with thoughtful innovations, our products also provide our customers with exceptional value.

Product features:
-Dimensions: 5.375 x 9.375 x 6 inches
- 5.375” Width
- 9.375” Height 
- 6” Depth
- 6.5 lbs Weight
- Ceramic PTC Heating
- 1500 watts
- 3 Settings:
- High Heat
- Low Heat
- Fan only
- Adjustable Thermostat
- Fan-forced for Wide Heat Dispersion
- Stay Cool Body
- 6” Power Cord
- Power Indicator Light
- Carrying Handle
- Safety Tip-Over Switch
- Overheat Protection System
- Fully Assembled in Box
- UL, ,ETL, & CSA Listed
- CE Certified
- NOM & SAA Approved
feature_bullets: EASY TO USE: Simply turn the dial to high or low heat, or fan only, and then, using the other dial, adjust the intensity to your comfort. A red power indicator light shows when the device is on.
SUPER PORTABLE POWER: Small in size and lightweight with a convenient carrying handle, this portable heater can take away the chill and warm you up whenever and wherever you need it.
SAVVY TECHNOLOGY: These heaters use a Positive Temperature Coefficient (PTC) heating system in which specialized ceramic heating discs enhance the transfer of heat in small spaces.
LOWER YOUR HEATING COSTS: By heating only the room you are in with this heater, you slightly lower your house-wide thermostat, which can save you money on seasonal energy bills.
COMFORT ZONE FOR YOUR SAFETY: As a leader in safety and reliability, Comfort Zone products are designed and tested to meet strict global quality standards like UL, ETL, SAA, CE, CSA, & NOM.
